sentences: He started his singing career  with the film Varsham (2004), composed by his brother Devi Sri Prasad.

He started his singing career  with the film Varsham (2004), composed by his brother Devi Sri Prasad. "Top Lechipoddi", "Sailaja Sailaja", "Nannaku Prematho", "Pakka Local", "Jatha Kalise", "Nammaka Thappani" and "Hello Guru Prema Kosame" are some of his popular songs.
Sagar started his career with the film Varsham (2004) and then sang around 80 songs.
He has mostly collaborated with his brother Devi Sri Prasad in playback singing.
In June 2019, he married Dr. Mounica Sagar.
